instances.description: Computer vision max-flow instances converted to min-cost flow

lemon.notes: Phase 4 MVP: Download framework complete. Manual download recommended - visit LEMON wiki page for current file listings. LEMON library: Boost 1.0. Generated instances (NETGEN/GRIDGEN/GOTO): Public Domain. Real-world instances (ROAD/VISION): Verify original licenses.

usage_notes.download_instructions: Problem files are not committed to the repository. Use download scripts in Phase 3+ to obtain benchmark instances.
usage_notes.local_storage: Downloaded problems are stored in benchmarks/problems/ and excluded from git via .gitignore
usage_notes.attribution: Always provide proper attribution when using benchmark instances. See benchmarks/metadata/licenses.json for requirements.
usage_notes.known_solutions: Known optimal solutions are documented in benchmarks/metadata/known_solutions.json for correctness validation
